statements: SELECT id, identity, reason, date_added FROM fraudulent_identities;
SELECT identity, reason FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT id, identity FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT DISTINCT reason FROM fraudulent_identities;
SELECT id, identity, reason, date_added FROM fraudulent_identities ORDER BY date_added DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' AND date_added >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT identity, reason FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE date_added = '2021-10-15' ORDER BY identity ASC;
SELECT id, reason FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE identity = 'John Doe' OR identity = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT id, identity, reason, date_added FROM fraudulent_identities LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, identity_number FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE identity_number = '123456789' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT identity_number, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE address = '123 Main St' OR address = '456 Elm St'
SELECT * FROM blocked_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM blocked_users WHERE block_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, block_reason FROM blocked_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, block_reason FROM blocked_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, identity_number FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blocked_users WHERE block_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities;
SELECT identity_name, identity_type FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE is_blocked = true;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, block_reason FROM blocked_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT notification_id, blocked_by_user, notification_sent_at FROM block_notification WHERE notification_sent = false;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE is_blocked = TRUE;
SELECT identity_name, identity_type FROM fraudulent_identities WHERE identity_type = 'Customer' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, block_reason, blocked_at FROM blocked_transactions WHERE block_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY blocked_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_log WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT blocked_identity_id, blocked_by_user, notification_sent, notification_sent_at FROM block_notification WHERE notification_sent = FALSE ORDER BY notification_sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = true;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT description, created_at FROM blacklist WHERE identity = 'example_identity';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_login FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM blacklist ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = true;
SELECT b.id, u.username, b.description FROM blacklist b JOIN users u ON b.identity = u.username;
SELECT u.username, a.timestamp FROM users u LEFT JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.username, f.timestamp, b.reason FROM users u LEFT JOIN failed_login_attempts f ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN blocked_accounts b ON u.user_id = b.user_id;
